verses.kjv: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.
verses.ct: To you, LORD, I offer my whole soul.

verses.kjv: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
verses.ct: My God, I place my confidence in you. Don't let me be humiliated; don't let my enemies celebrate my defeat.

verses.kjv: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
verses.ct: No one who puts their hope in you will be disgraced, but those who betray others without reason — they will be the ones put to shame.

verses.kjv: Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.
verses.ct: Reveal your directions to me, LORD; show me how to walk in your paths.

verses.kjv: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
verses.ct: Guide me according to your truth and instruct me, because you are the God of my salvation. I wait for you all day long.

verses.kjv: Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.
verses.ct: LORD, remember your deep compassion and your faithful love — they have existed from the very beginning.

verses.kjv: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O LORD.
verses.ct: Don't hold the sins of my younger days against me, or my rebellious acts. Instead, think of me through the lens of your mercy, because of your goodness, LORD.

verses.kjv: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
verses.ct: The LORD is good and does what is right, so he shows sinners the correct path.

verses.kjv: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
verses.ct: He guides the humble toward justice, and he teaches the humble his way.

verses.kjv: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
verses.ct: Every road the LORD leads on is marked by mercy and faithfulness for those who honor his covenant and follow his instructions.

verses.kjv: For thy name’s sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.
verses.ct: For the sake of your reputation, LORD, forgive my guilt — because it is enormous.

verses.kjv: What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
verses.ct: Who is the person that deeply reveres the LORD? God will show that person which path to take.

verses.kjv: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
verses.ct: That person's soul will rest in prosperity, and their descendants will inherit the earth.

verses.kjv: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
verses.ct: The LORD shares his intimate counsel with those who are wholeheartedly dedicated to him, and he reveals his covenant to them.

verses.kjv: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
verses.ct: My eyes are always focused on the LORD, because he is the one who will free my feet from the trap.

verses.kjv: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
verses.ct: Look my way and show me mercy, because I am lonely and suffering.

verses.kjv: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
verses.ct: The anguish in my heart keeps growing — please rescue me from my overwhelming troubles.

verses.kjv: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
verses.ct: See my suffering and my pain, and wipe away all of my sins.

verses.kjv: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
verses.ct: Pay attention to how many enemies I have; they despise me with vicious hatred.

verses.kjv: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
verses.ct: Protect my soul and rescue me. Don't let me be disgraced, because I have put my trust in you.

verses.kjv: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
verses.ct: Let honesty and moral character be my shield, because my hope rests in you.

verses.kjv: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
verses.ct: God, set Israel free from all its troubles.
